sentences.en: A special dispensation may be obtained from the domestic union concerned.
sentences.cn: 从国内相关的工会那儿或许能得到一项特许。

sentences.en: As far as I'm concerned the officials incited the fight.
sentences.cn: 在我看来，是官员们煽动了这场争斗。

sentences.en: As far as we're concerned, the matter is settled.
sentences.cn: 我们这边已经安排妥当了。

sentences.en: Divorce is very painful, especially when children are concerned.
sentences.cn: 离婚是非常痛苦的，涉及孩子的话更是如此。

sentences.en: Everyone was very concerned whether he would pull through or not.
sentences.cn: 每个人都很关心他是否能够挺过去。

sentences.en: He was concerned with the enhancement of the human condition.
sentences.cn: 他关心人类生存环境的改善。

sentences.en: His project is concerned with applying the technology to practical business problems.
sentences.cn: 他的项目是将这项技术应用于实际的商务问题。

sentences.en: I believe he was concerned in all those matters you mention.
sentences.cn: 我认为你提到的那些事都与他有关。

sentences.en: I have always had an enquiring mind where food is concerned.
sentences.cn: 我在吃的方面一向很爱探究求索。

sentences.en: Randolph's work was exclusively concerned with the effects of pollution on health.
sentences.cn: 伦道夫的著作专门论述污染对健康的影响。

sentences.en: Some of the farmers concerned suffer particularly from the low prices.
sentences.cn: 涉及的农民当中，有些人因低价受到的损失尤为惨重。

sentences.en: The union is particularly concerned at the sourcing of products abroad.
sentences.cn: 该联盟尤其关注海外的产品货源。

sentences.en: They were concerned only with their own religious fervour.
sentences.cn: 他们只在乎自己的宗教信仰。

sentences.en: They were more concerned about the dogs' welfare than a clean getaway.
sentences.cn: 他们更加关心那些狗的安危，而非自己如何干净利落地脱身。

sentences.en: They will be concerned to cut back expenditure on unnecessary items.
sentences.cn: 他们将会考虑削减不必要的开销。

sentences.en: We are trying to reach an agreement with all concerned (= everyone who is involved or affected ) .
sentences.cn: 我们试图与相关各方达成协议。

sentences.en: While economists are free to theorise, company chairmen are concerned with actualities.
sentences.cn: 经济学家们可自由创建理论，公司总裁们则关心现实情况。

sentences.en: Working abroad should be an exciting and positive experience for all concerned.
sentences.cn: 在海外工作对所有相关人员来说都应该是一段让人兴奋而愉快的经历。

words.tran_cn: 担心地；关心公众事务地

phrases.tran_cn: 当事人；有关方面；协议双方；当事者

trans.tran_cn: 忧虑的，认为重要的，关注的
trans.tran_en: involved in something or affected by it

trans.tran_cn: 关心（concern的过去时和过去分词）；与…有关
